Comment: Trump has always been better for vets. A couple of months after he got in office my claim finally started to get traction and was handled; despite speculation from "fellow conservatives" here that the layoffs would further delay it. It was like this the last term too. He puts people in charge of the VA who really care about the mission and drive accountability. Trump has done more for vets than any president we've had since I got out (Obama and Biden). The VA Mission Act was a huge improvement, any vet denying how much better that made VA health care on Reddit probably isn't a real disabled vet.
Author: According-Activity87
